message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, but $120 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $125?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm getting close to accepting, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about $127?
I'm willing to meet you at $128, Bob. I think this is a fair price for both of us. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm almost there, but I'm still a bit short. How about $125.50?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $126.50. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
I'm not going to get any closer than $125. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me there. How about $125?
